description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
What's Changed
Hunyuan2.0 3D support
- Rotate main.log file to make it easier to debug user sessions. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1056
- Remove duplicate Windows build CI. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1061
- Check if directory is empty before installation warning. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1060
- Install Path Validation Improvements by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1059
- [API] Publish types for version 0.4.31 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1067
- Only track first generation. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1069
- Check response of shell.openPath for errors. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1066
- update frontend to v1.14.5 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1070
- Update ComfyUI to v0.3.27 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1071
- Remove core branch. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1072
- Update patch to update requirements. by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1073
- v0.4.32 by @robinjhuang in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1074
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.4.30...v0.4.32
